key.stat.generic.armor_bonus_scaling.too:
Increases the stats you gain from [key.item_tag.armor] you're wearing.
Does not affect [key.flag.enchanted](Enchantment) strength.
key.stat.generic.dual_weapon_stamina_cos: Scales the cost of your dual wielding penalty.
key.stat.generic.dual_weapon_damage_mult: Scales the dual wielding damage penalty.
key.stat.generic.duaL_weapon_attack_spee: Dual Wield Attack Speed Mult Penalty
Dual Wield Attack Speed Mult Penalty
Scales the dual wielding attack speed penalty.
key.stat.generic.item_swap_speed.tooltip:
Holstering and drawing items takes time - this stat improves how quickly you can do that.
It is also increased by your [key.stat.attack.speed].
